subject: Medicine
title: Open-Label Placebos
description: A micro-lesson that makes Open-Label Placebos usable.

hook.text: What if a placebo still works even when you know it is fake?

buildup.text: Open-label placebos are given with full honesty to patients.

discovery.text: Studies show they still reduce pain and fatigue in many cases.

twist.text: The ritual of taking a pill matters as much as belief.

climax.text: This challenges our idea that deception is required.

punchline.text: Honesty does not cancel the effect.

quiz.question: What makes open-label placebos different from traditional ones?
options: Patients know they are taking a placebo
They contain small amounts of real medicine
They are only used in children
